module.name: Parking Lot
module.description: Manages parking lot extensions and other options. Parking is a way of putting calls "on hold", and then picking them up from any extension.
module.changelog: *13.0.19.6* FREEPBX-14861 custom alert info fields URL encoding *13.0.19.5* Added support for res_parking_custom.conf - Thanks Darren Hollick! *13.0.19.4* FREEPBX-14300 hints are always generated regardless *13.0.19.3* FREEPBX-13470 fwconsole reload failure *13.0.19.2* FREEPBX-13333 show slot range *13.0.19.1* FREEPBX-13333 validate all input into the form correctly *13.0.19* FREEPBX-13364 Ability to set ringer volumes *13.0.18.1* FREEPBX-13294 more cleanup and testing *13.0.18* FREEPBX-13294 cleanup in detecting empty slots *13.0.17* FREEPBX-12576 better channel lookup *13.0.16* Speed up reload times with dynamic hints *13.0.15* Generate hints for pjsip *13.0.14* Dont quote the channel name when getting shared channel variables *13.0.13* FREEPBX-11236 deal with spaces in trunk names *13.0.12* Add Park to your Assigned Lot feature code *13.0.11* Support drop down Alert Info *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10450 *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10657 Make id auto_increment *13.0.8* Adjust layout to allow slideout menus *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10447 Stop reverting destinations in parking lots *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9138 change int to bigint *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10217 Fix parking form *13.0.4* Remove duplicated numeric checker which is bad *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9542 Editing a Parking Lot Creates New Lot Instead *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha5* FREEPBX-9467 Update search hooks *13.0.1alpha4* No device null error *13.0.1alpha3* Restructure translations *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-8904 Fix park return routing in Asterisk 13.2 and higher *13.0.1alpha1* Fix saving in 13 with PDO
